SELECT NO ,NAME ,GENDER ,REGISTRATION_NUMBER ,PHONE_NUMBER ,EMAIL ,CAUTION FROM PATIENT
WHERE ${searchType} LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
WHERE ${searchType} LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PATIENT
AND NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND EMAIL LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
SELECT NO ,NAME ,GENDER ,REGISTRATION_NUMBER ,PHONE_NUMBER ,EMAIL ,CAUTION FROM PATIENT WHERE NAME=#{name} OR GENDER=#{gender}
SELECT NO ,NAME ,GENDER ,REGISTRATION_NUMBER ,PHONE_NUMBER ,EMAIL ,CAUTION FROM PATIENT WHERE NO = #{no}
SELECT R.NO ,NAME ,GENDER ,REGISTRATION_NUMBER ,PHONE_NUMBER ,EMAIL ,CAUTION , R.SYMPTOM FROM RECEIPT R JOIN PATIENT P ON R.PATIENT_NO = P.NO ORDER BY NO DESC
SELECT R.NO ,NAME ,GENDER ,REGISTRATION_NUMBER ,PHONE_NUMBER ,EMAIL ,CAUTION , R.SYMPTOM FROM RECEIPT R JOIN PATIENT P ON R.PATIENT_NO = P.NO WHERE R.NO = #{no}

SELECT R.NO AS rno ,R.PATIENT_NO AS patientNo ,R.SYMPTOM AS symptom ,P.NAME AS name ,D.MEDICAL_RECORD AS medicalRecord FROM RECEIPT R JOIN PATIENT P ON P.NO= R.PATIENT_NO JOIN DIAGNOSIS D ON D.RECEIPT_NO = R.NO WHERE R.NO = ${no}
